pages.title: Dissolve
pages.text: Cost: Spell + Clock$(br2)Max Level: 1$(br2)XP Cost: 8$(br2)A easy spell to make and use, when striking an entity, it will clear them of all status effects

When you cast the spell, a projectile will be thrown from your body, upon striking another entity, it will clear all effects from them, good or bad.$(br)This spell could easily have combat practicality since you could clear your enemies beneficial effects
